Ergonomic Design: Redesign the ski poles to have an ergonomic design that allows for a more natural wrist and hand position, reducing the risk of injury and fatigue.
Lightweight Material: Use lightweight materials like carbon fiber or aluminum to make the ski poles more lightweight and easier to carry around.
Built-in Navigation System: Incorporate a GPS or compass into the ski poles to help skiers navigate the slopes more easily and safely.
Safety Features: Add a safety feature that alerts other skiers or snowboarders if the ski poles are in close proximity to avoid collisions.
Temperature Control: Incorporate temperature control technology into the ski poles to keep the skier's hands warm in cold weather and prevent frostbite.
